"Cristobal": "I need you to eliminate some Enhanced Enemies."
"According to our troops, their numbers have been growing over in the Bergana Ruins."
"If they're not defeated, it would pose a great threat to our future missions."
"I have to supervise the squad and can't leave the camp."
"So I need you to go out there and do it for us. It's not an easy task, but I trust you can do it."
